name: Me && MORY
description:
Me && MORY is a cryptic and minimalist puzzle game.

Universe has its secrets and mysteries...

MORY has to restore all sticky Data.

FEATURES

  • Minimalist pixel graphics.
  • Synthetic and nostalgic soundtrack.
  • 16 levels of puzzles to solve.
  • Dive into a cryptic and mysterious universe with its own codes and symbols.

STORY TIMELINE

This game is the prequel of LAMBDA end THEORY.

DATA + STARS Saga - Volume 1 includes the following games:

  • Me && MORY
  • LAMBDA end THEORY
